newProperties.name: Title
newProperties.description: The title of the episode. RSS: <item><title>

newProperties.name: Description
newProperties.description: Description of the episode. Equivalent to <itunes:summary>. RSS: <item><description> OR <item><itunes:summary>

newProperties.name: Image
newProperties.description: URL to show thumbnail: NOTE: Artwork must be a minimum size of 1400 x 1400 pixels and a maximum size of 3000 x 3000 pixels, in JPEG or PNG format, 72 dpi, with appropriate file extensions (.jpg, .png), and in the RGB colorspace. Equivalent to <itunes:image>. RSS: <item><image><url> OR <item><itunes:image>

newProperties.name: Two letter Language code
newProperties.description: The language specified for the podcast episode. RSS: <channel><language>

newProperties.name: Language in English
newProperties.description: The language(s) used in the podcast episode. Stated in English.

newProperties.name: Object
newProperties.description: The ContentId of the file content file uploaded to the dataDirectory

newProperties.name: Author
newProperties.description: The author of the episode. Equivalent to <managingEditor> and <itunes:author>. RSS: <item><managingEditor> OR <item><itunes:author>

newProperties.name: Subtitle
newProperties.description: A short description of the episode. Equivalent to <itunes:subtitle>. RSS: <item><itunes:subtitle>

newProperties.name: Season
newProperties.description: The season of the Podcast which the episode belongs to.  RSS: <item><itunes:season>

newProperties.name: Explicit
newProperties.description: Indicates whether the episode contains explicit material. You can specify the following values:. RSS: <item><itunes:explicit>
